name: archetype_spectrum_test
description: Test behavioral differences across rebalanced archetypes. 4 players spanning TAG, Rock, Station, and LAG to see distinct play patterns emerge from anchor changes.
hypothesis: TAG (Joan of Arc) will have highest raise% with tight range. Rock (Buddha) will have highest fold% and lowest raise%. Station (Alice) will have highest call% and lowest fold%. LAG (Napoleon) will be aggressive with wide range.
